listings.name: Rapunzel's Coffee & Books
listings.description: Rapunzel's Coffee and Books is an eclectic arts venue, community space, coffee shop, and used bookstore located in The Packing Shed in historic Lovingston, Virginia. Rapunzel's Further Ado Foundation hosts live music every Wednesday Friday and Saturday evenings starting at 8pm.

listings.name: Sweet Bliss Bakery
listings.description: Our desserts are lovingly handcrafted from the finest ingredients. We love supporting our local farmers and offer seasonal desserts so they are at their peak of freshness. We are passionate about creating fresh decadent desserts. Our specialty are cheesecakes and cakes with over 50 flavors.

listings.name: Terrace Café
listings.description: Stop in for a shot of energy! The Terrace Café proudly serve Starbucks beverages. Enjoy breakfast sandwiches sweet treats and warm specialty drinks to brighten your day. Hours vary by season.

listings.name: Trager Brothers Coffee
listings.description: Family-owned specialty coffee shop serving only Organic coffee. OCIA certified Organic coffee roastery committed to bringing the highest quality freshest coffee. We are proud to serve locally roasted beans and homemade baked goods.

listings.name: Trager Brothers Coffee 2.0
listings.description: Second location of Trager Brothers Coffee. Proud to serve only Organic coffee as OCIA certified Organic coffee roastery. Convenient location with same quality coffee and welcoming atmosphere.

listings.name: Afton Market
listings.description: Local market featuring fresh produce specialty foods Virginia wines and craft items. Supporting Nelson County farmers and artisans. Open daily with seasonal hours.

listings.name: Ashley's Market
listings.description: Family-owned market offering groceries, deli items, Virginia products and everyday essentials. Serving the local community with friendly service. Located along Route 151.

listings.name: Chicken Coop
listings.description: Homemade chicken, barbecue, fresh burgers, mac and cheese, and variety of sandwiches. Located in the Nelson Food Mart (Exxon Station). Popular local spot known for quality Southern comfort food and daily specials.

listings.name: Colleen Deli
listings.description: Daily fried chicken and lunch specials. Full breakfast served from open to close. Salad bar during the summer. Full menu featuring sandwiches, wraps, subs and more. Homemade baked goods for your sweet tooth. Located in the Colleen Exxon & Convenience Mart on Rt. 29.

listings.name: Corner Market
listings.description: Convenience store and gas. Deli open for breakfast and lunch. Stop in and check out our deli items. Friendly local market serving the Schuyler community.

listings.name: Graves Grocery & Deli
listings.description: Convenience store and gas. Deli open: breakfast and lunch daily. Serving the Nellysford community with groceries, hot deli items, and everyday essentials.

listings.name: Hickman's Exxon Grocery
listings.description: Game Checking Station (all game). Convenience store and gas station offering groceries, snacks, beverages, and local goods. Full deli counter with prepared foods.

listings.name: IGA Blue Ridge Grocery
listings.description: Independent grocery store offering fresh produce, meat, baked goods, and grocery essentials. Full-service deli counter with daily specials. Complete one-stop shopping destination.

listings.name: Ike's Market & Deli
listings.description: Local market featuring groceries, deli items, hot foods, and Virginia specialties. Game Checking Station. Known for friendly service and quality products in historic Schuyler.

listings.name: Indian Oven
listings.description: Authentic Indian cuisine featuring tandoori specialties, curries, vegetarian options and traditional favorites. Family-owned restaurant bringing the flavors of India to the mountains with fresh spices and traditional cooking techniques.

listings.name: Mac's Country Store
listings.description: Grocery Store and Gas. Featuring local honey, fishing supplies and bait. Convenient stop for everyday needs and outdoor supplies. Local products and friendly service.

listings.name: The Market at Wintergreen
listings.description: Convenience Store, Groceries, Deli and Gas. Wintergreen sweatshirts and tee shirts. Deli open: 7:30 am to 7:30 pm daily. Resort convenience store for guests and visitors.

listings.name: Williams Grocery
listings.description: Grocery Store and Gas. Featuring local honey, fishing supplies and bait. Convenient stop for everyday needs and outdoor supplies in historic Schuyler.

listings.name: Ann's Family Restaurant
listings.description: Good old country cooking. Fresh vegetables and specials every day. Closed Saturday. Family-owned restaurant serving traditional Southern meals with daily specials and home-style cooking.

listings.name: Basic Necessities
listings.description: Locally owned market featuring natural foods, organic produce, bulk items, vitamins, and specialty health products. Supporting local farmers and sustainable living.

listings.name: Blue Mountain Brewery
listings.description: Farm brewery and taproom with an on-site hop yard. Full restaurant menu featuring locally-sourced ingredients and spectacular mountain views from multiple decks. Award-winning craft beers since 2007.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Pig
listings.description: Authentic Southern barbecue featuring pulled pork, brisket, ribs, and all the fixin's. Popular local spot known for quality meats smoked to perfection. Family-friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Bold Kitchen at Bold Rock
listings.description: Full kitchen at Bold Rock Hard Cider featuring wood-fired pizzas, burgers, seasonal dishes, and comfort food. Enjoy craft cider with delicious food on the scenic grounds.

listings.name: Chen's Restaurant
listings.description: Family-owned Chinese restaurant serving authentic dishes, sushi, and Asian cuisine. Traditional recipes and friendly service in a comfortable setting.

listings.name: Chirio's Pizza
listings.description: Authentic Italian pizzeria serving traditional and creative pizza combinations. Fresh ingredients, homemade dough, and traditional Italian flavors. Cozy neighborhood spot.

listings.name: Coquito Kitchen
listings.description: Puerto Rican fusion restaurant serving authentic Caribbean flavors. Coquito traditional recipes, plantains, arroz con gandules, and specialty cocktails. Vibrant dining experience.

listings.name: Devils Backbone Brewing
listings.description: Award-winning craft brewery nestled at the base of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Enjoy locally-brewed beers, live music, and mountain views from the outdoor beer garden. Full restaurant.

listings.name: El Mariachi Mexican Food
listings.description: Authentic Mexican restaurant serving traditional tacos, enchiladas, burritos, and daily specials. Fresh ingredients and traditional recipes in a vibrant atmosphere.

listings.name: Bryant's Cider & Brewery
listings.description: Craft brewery and hard cider producer featuring small-batch brews and Virginia apple ciders. Tasting room with mountain views. Known for creative seasonal offerings and friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Bold Rock Hard Cider
listings.description: Virginia's first cidery and taproom featuring handcrafted hard ciders made from fresh-pressed Virginia apples. Enjoy live music on the outdoor stage with mountain views, lawn games, and seasonal cider releases.

listings.name: Blue Toad Hard Cider
listings.description: Small-batch hard cider made from Virginia apples. Tasting room with scenic mountain views. Artisanal ciders with unique flavor profiles. Outdoor seating and friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Blue Mountain Brewery
listings.description: Farm brewery and taproom with an on-site hop yard. Full restaurant menu featuring locally-sourced ingredients and spectacular mountain views from multiple decks. Award-winning craft beers.

listings.name: Devils Backbone Brewing Company
listings.description: Award-winning craft brewery offering a variety of flagship and seasonal beers. Mountain views from the outdoor beer garden. Full restaurant menu. Live music weekends.

listings.name: Outback Brew House
listings.description: Small batch brewery featuring handcrafted beers and seasonal releases. Cozy taproom with local character. Rotating food trucks and live music. Community-focused atmosphere.

listings.name: 12 Ridges Vineyard
listings.description: Family-owned vineyard featuring estate-grown grapes and award-winning wines. Beautiful mountain views and intimate tasting room. Winery tours and private events available.

listings.name: Afton Mountain Vineyards
listings.description: Stunning mountaintop winery with sweeping valley views. Award-winning Chardonnay and Cabernet Franc. Spacious tasting room with floor-to-ceiling windows. Covered outdoor terrace perfect for picnics.

listings.name: Cardinal Point Winery
listings.description: Family-owned boutique winery specializing in small-batch Virginia wines. Intimate tasting room with panoramic views of the Rockfish Valley. Known for their award-winning Viognier and Petit Verdot.

listings.name: Veritas Vineyards & Winery
listings.description: Award-winning winery with stunning views of the Blue Ridge foothills. Elegant tasting room and covered pavilion. Wine and cheese pairings. Live music Sunday afternoons.

listings.name: Giuseppe's Restaurant
listings.description: Italian restaurant serving traditional pasta dishes, pizza, and Italian favorites. Family-owned establishment known for generous portions and authentic recipes. Wine list available.

listings.name: Iron and Ale
listings.description: Gastropub featuring craft beer and elevated pub fare. Signature burgers, sandwiches, and daily specials. Cozy atmosphere with outdoor patio. Craft beer selection from local breweries.

listings.name: Montebello Country Store & Cafe
listings.description: Historic country store offering groceries, supplies, hot food, and local goods. Caf serving breakfast and lunch daily. Convenient stop for hikers and travelers. Historic building with character.

listings.name: Paulie's Pig Out
listings.description: Barbecue restaurant specializing in pulled pork, brisket, ribs, and Southern sides. Pit-smoked meats and traditional barbecue sauces. Casual family dining with hearty portions.

listings.name: Smokin' Barrel Restaurant
listings.description: Barbecue and smokehouse featuring slow-smoked meats, Southern sides, and craft beer. Pit-smoked specialties with flavorful rubs and sauces. Casual mountain atmosphere.

listings.name: The Copper Mine Bistro
listings.description: Bistro offering farm-to-table cuisine featuring locally-sourced ingredients. Creative menu with seasonal specials. Wine and craft beer selection. Cozy upscale dining.

listings.name: The Edge
listings.description: Casual dining at Wintergreen Resort featuring American classics and daily specials. Family-friendly atmosphere with mountain views. Full bar with local craft beers and cocktails.

listings.name: The Farmhouse at Veritas
listings.description: Fine dining restaurant at Veritas Vineyards featuring contemporary American cuisine with local ingredients. Farm-to-table philosophy with wine pairings. Elegant atmosphere.

listings.name: Vito's Pizza & Italian Grill
listings.description: Authentic Italian pizzeria and grill serving traditional recipes. Hand-tossed pizzas, pasta dishes, and Italian entrees. Family recipes passed down through generations.

listings.name: Black Bear Creamery
listings.description: Artisan ice cream shop featuring homemade flavors and local ingredients. Seasonal specialties and traditional favorites. Outdoor seating with mountain views. Sweet treats and coffee.

listings.name: Dickie Brothers Orchard
listings.description: Pick-your-own apple orchard offering a variety of apple varieties. Seasonal activities including hayrides, corn maze, and farm store. Fresh apple products and seasonal treats.

listings.name: Drumheller's Orchard
listings.description: Family-owned orchard offering pick-your-own apples in season. Farm store featuring fresh produce, apple products, and local goods. Seasonal activities and scenic mountain views.

listings.name: Saunders Brothers Farm Market
listings.description: Farm market featuring fresh produce, local goods, and seasonal products from the family farm. Direct-from-farm freshness. Seasonal vegetables, fruits, and homemade items.

listings.name: Crabtree Falls
listings.description: Virginia's highest vertical-drop cascading waterfall. This moderate 3-mile round trip hike features stunning overlooks and is especially beautiful in fall foliage season. The trail follows a series of cascades totaling over 1,200 feet. Well-maintained trail with multiple viewing platforms.

listings.name: Humpback Rocks
listings.description: Challenging 2-mile hike to stunning 360-degree Blue Ridge views. Part of the Appalachian Trail with rocky terrain and rewarding summit panoramas. Popular sunrise and sunset destination. Blue Ridge Parkway access.
listings.address: Milepost 5.8, Blue Ridge Parkway, Afton, VA 22920

listings.name: Three Ridges
listings.description: Challenging 13.6-mile loop trail featuring stunning vistas, rock scrambles, and mountain laurel forests. Part of the Appalachian Trail offering some of the best views in Virginia. Primitive camping available. Strenuous but rewarding.

listings.name: Spy Rock
listings.description: A moderately challenging 3.7-mile out-and-back trail leading to stunning 360-degree views from a rocky outcrop. Popular spot for sunrise and sunset photography. The trail passes through beautiful hardwood forest with glimpses of wildlife.

listings.name: Devils Backbone Distilling Co.
listings.description: Craft distillery producing vodka, gin, whiskey, and moonshine using Virginia grains. Tours and tastings available Friday-Sunday. Beautiful mountain views from the tasting room patio. Family-friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Silverback Distillery
listings.description: Small-batch craft distillery producing premium spirits from local ingredients. Seasonal releases and specialty cocktails. Beautiful tasting room with mountain views. Tours by appointment.

listings.name: Virginia Distillery Co.
listings.description: Premium whiskey distillery crafting Scottish-style single malt and American whiskey. Sophisticated tasting room and tours. Award-winning spirits with heritage techniques. Beautiful rural setting.

listings.name: The Retreat at Crabtree Falls
listings.description: Distinctive lodging experience in Virginia's Blue Ridge Mountains. Spacious accommodations with fully equipped kitchens and comfortable living areas. Proximity to stunning Crabtree Falls and hiking trails. Secluded location offering tranquility and privacy. Modern amenities combined with rustic charm.

listings.name: Three Sisters Log Cabin
listings.description: Pre-Civil War historic log cabin in the Village of Lovingston. Historical district location with self-guided tour access. Two-bedroom remote cottage with full kitchen, bathroom, washer/dryer, grill and firepit. Walk to wineries, breweries, and restaurants.

listings.name: Montebello Resort
listings.description: Mountain resort offering cabins and camping in beautiful natural setting. Access to hiking trails, fishing, and outdoor recreation. Rustic accommodations with modern conveniences. Family-friendly activities.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Tunnel
listings.description: Historic railroad tunnel converted to hiking trail. Walk through the quarter-mile tunnel with headlamps through the darkness. Unique underground hiking experience. Part of Claudius Crozet's engineering marvel connecting the Blue Ridge Mountains.

listings.name: Fortune's Cove Nature Preserve
listings.description: Protected natural area with hiking trails through mature forests. Scenic overlooks and diverse wildlife. Educational programs and guided walks available. Conservation-focused recreation area.

listings.name: James River State Park
listings.description: State park featuring 1,550 acres along the James River. Hiking trails, fishing, canoeing, and camping. Riverside trails and scenic overlooks. Visitor center with nature exhibits and programs.

listings.name: Rockfish Valley Trail
listings.description: Easy 2-mile paved trail perfect for walking, jogging, or biking. Follows Rockfish River with mountain views and connects to local breweries and shops. Family-friendly and accessible for all ages.

listings.name: Stoney Creek Golf Course
listings.description: Championship 18-hole golf course designed by Rees Jones. Features dramatic elevation changes, mountain views, and challenging play for all skill levels. Pro shop and cart rental available.

listings.name: The Plunge
listings.description: Outdoor aquatic complex featuring water slides, lazy river, zero-entry pool, and lap pool. Perfect family summer destination with mountain views. Lifeguards on duty.

listings.name: Walton's Mountain Museum
listings.description: Museum dedicated to The Waltons television show featuring memorabilia, props, and exhibits about the show's history in Schuyler. Located in historic country store. Guided tours available.

listings.name: Allen Creek Nature Preserve
listings.description: Protected nature preserve with hiking trails through diverse forest ecosystems. Educational nature programs and wildlife viewing opportunities. Family-friendly trails with interpretive signage.

listings.name: Appalachian Trail from Rt 56 to Harpers Creek
listings.description: Scenic section of the Appalachian Trail featuring mountain ridge walks, forest views, and challenging terrain. Connects to other AT sections. Popular for day hikes and overnight backpacking.

listings.name: Blackrock Trail
listings.description: Moderate 1-mile loop trail to unique rock formations. Part of the Appalachian Trail with stunning Blue Ridge views. Rocky terrain with some challenging scrambles near summit.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Tunnel
listings.description: Historic railroad tunnel converted to hiking trail. Walk through the quarter-mile tunnel with headlamps through the darkness. Unique underground hiking experience. Part of Claudius Crozet's engineering marvel connecting the Blue Ridge Mountains.

listings.name: Brimstone Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail featuring rocky terrain and mountain views. Strenuous sections with rewarding scenic overlooks. Part of larger trail network offering wilderness experience.

listings.name: Cedar Cliffs North Trail
listings.description: Moderate trail through hardwood forest to scenic cliffs overlooking valleys. Beautiful year-round with excellent fall foliage viewing. Well-marked and maintained path.

listings.name: Chestnut Springs Trail
listings.description: Easy-to-moderate trail following a mountain spring. Beautiful wildflowers in spring and colorful foliage in fall. Family-friendly with gentle elevation gain.

listings.name: Crabtree Falls
listings.description: Virginia's highest vertical-drop cascading waterfall. This moderate 3-mile round trip hike features stunning overlooks and is especially beautiful in fall foliage season. The trail follows a series of cascades totaling over 1,200 feet.

listings.name: Devils Knob Trail
listings.description: Mountain summit trail with challenging elevation gain. Spectacular 360-degree views from Devils Knob. Part of Wintergreen Resort trail network. Steep rocky sections.

listings.name: Fortune's Cove Nature Preserve
listings.description: Protected natural area with hiking trails through mature forests. Scenic overlooks and diverse wildlife. Educational programs and guided walks available. Conservation-focused recreation area.

listings.name: Fortune's Ridge Trail
listings.description: Moderate trail with rolling terrain through mountain forests. Multiple scenic overlooks. Connects to other trail networks. Popular for hiking and wildlife watching.

listings.name: Hemlock Springs Loop
listings.description: Easy 2.5-mile loop trail through hemlock groves and mountain springs. Gentle elevation changes perfect for beginners. Cool forest environment even in summer.

listings.name: Highlands Leisure Trail
listings.description: Easy paved trail perfect for families, joggers, and walkers. Connect various Wintergreen resort amenities. Accessible to all abilities with gentle terrain.

listings.name: Humpback Rocks
listings.description: Challenging 2-mile hike to stunning 360-degree Blue Ridge views. Part of the Appalachian Trail with rocky terrain and rewarding summit panoramas. Popular sunrise and sunset destination.
listings.address: Milepost 5.8, Blue Ridge Parkway, Afton, VA 22920

listings.name: James River State Park
listings.description: State park featuring 1,550 acres along the James River. Hiking trails, fishing, canoeing, and camping. Riverside trails and scenic overlooks. Visitor center with nature exhibits and programs.

listings.name: Virginia Blue Ridge Railway Trail
listings.description: Multi-use trail following historic railroad right-of-way. Perfect for walking, jogging, and biking. Connects communities and offers scenic river and mountain views.

listings.name: Laurel Ridge Loop
listings.description: Moderate 4-mile loop through mountain laurel forests. Spectacular when flowering in early summer. Mix of forest and meadow environments with scenic overlooks.

listings.name: Lower Shamokin Falls Trail
listings.description: Trail to beautiful cascading waterfall in secluded mountain setting. Moderate difficulty with some rocky sections. Best after rainfall for maximum water flow.

listings.name: Mau-Har Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail connecting to Appalachian Trail network. Named for the stream it follows. Features waterfalls, forest, and mountain views. Part of longer backpacking loop.

listings.name: Montebello Nature Trail
listings.description: Easy 1-mile interpretive nature trail perfect for families. Educational signage about local flora and fauna. Great introduction to mountain ecology.

listings.name: Nelson County Wilderness Area
listings.description: Large protected wilderness area with extensive trail network. Backcountry camping allowed. Remote mountain terrain with diverse ecosystems. Solitude and adventure.

listings.name: North Fork of the Piney River
listings.description: Scenic mountain river offering fishing, tubing, and swimming opportunities. Popular summer destination for water recreation. Accessible from multiple points along the river.

listings.name: Old Appalachian Trail
listings.description: Historic section of Appalachian Trail before route relocation. Pleasant forest hiking with mountain views. Less crowded than current AT route.

listings.name: Paul's Creek Trail
listings.description: Trail following mountain creek through diverse forest. Multiple small waterfalls and pools. Popular for cooling off in summer. Moderate difficulty with gradual elevation gain.

listings.name: Pedlars Edge Trail
listings.description: Trail with rewarding mountain summit views. Moderate to challenging sections with rocky terrain. Excellent for experienced hikers seeking solitude.

listings.name: Pond Hollow Trail
listings.description: Easy 1.5-mile loop trail around mountain pond. Abundant wildlife and wetland ecology. Great for families with young children. Boardwalk section over wetland areas.

listings.name: Ravens Roost Park
listings.description: Scenic overlook park with stunning Blue Ridge views. Picnic area and interpretive displays. Popular for sunset viewing. Easy access from road.

listings.name: Shamokin Springs Nature Preserve
listings.description: Protected natural area with multiple springs and diverse ecology. Educational programs available. Beautiful forest trails and wildlife viewing opportunities.

listings.name: The Plunge
listings.description: Outdoor aquatic complex featuring water slides, lazy river, zero-entry pool, and lap pool. Perfect family summer destination with mountain views. Lifeguards on duty. Seasonal operation.

listings.name: Trillium Field
listings.description: Mountain meadow ablaze with white trillium wildflowers in spring. Spectacular seasonal display. Easy access trail through scenic mountain meadow. Peak viewing in late April-early May.

listings.name: Upper Shamokin Falls Trail
listings.description: Trail to upper section of mountain waterfall. Challenging sections with rewarding views. Rocky terrain with multiple overlook points. Less traveled than lower falls trail.

listings.name: Upper Shamokin Gorge Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail through dramatic mountain gorge. Spectacular rock formations and powerful waterfalls. Strenuous terrain for experienced hikers only.

listings.name: White Oak Trail
listings.description: Easy 2-mile loop through mature white oak forest. Gentle terrain perfect for all ages. Beautiful in autumn with golden oak leaves. Interpretive signage available.

listings.name: White Rock Falls
listings.description: Beautiful waterfall accessible via moderate trail. Rocky cascade through forest setting. Popular swimming hole below falls. Moderate elevation gain with rewarding destination.

listings.name: Three Ridges
listings.description: Challenging 13.6-mile loop trail featuring stunning vistas, rock scrambles, and mountain laurel forests. Part of the Appalachian Trail offering some of the best views in Virginia. Primitive camping available. Strenuous but rewarding.

listings.name: Stoney Creek Park
listings.description: Mountain park featuring creek access, picnic areas, and easy trails. Popular for families and fishing. Playground and facilities available. Scenic mountain setting.

listings.name: Spy Rock
listings.description: A moderately challenging 3.7-mile out-and-back trail leading to stunning 360-degree views from a rocky outcrop. Popular spot for sunrise and sunset photography. The trail passes through beautiful hardwood forest with glimpses of wildlife.

listings.name: Spruce Creek Park
listings.description: Community park with creek access, walking trails, and picnic facilities. Popular local gathering spot. Easy trails perfect for all ages.

listings.name: Rockfish Valley Loop Trails
listings.description: Network of interconnected trails through scenic Rockfish Valley. Multiple distance options from easy strolls to longer hikes. Connects to local amenities and natural areas.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Parkway Loops
listings.description: Multiple loop trail options along the Blue Ridge Parkway. Scenic mountain views and varying difficulty levels. Easy access to AT and other trail networks. Restroom facilities available.

listings.name: Oak Ridge Loop
listings.description: Moderate loop trail through oak-dominated forest. Seasonal interest year-round with excellent fall color. Multiple overlook points. Well-maintained mountain trail.

listings.name: Woodson's Mill Loop
listings.description: Historic mill trail featuring restored grist mill and scenic river views. Educational signage about mill operations and local history. Easy family-friendly walk.

listings.name: Walton's Mountain Museum Loop
listings.description: Museum dedicated to The Waltons television show featuring memorabilia, props, and exhibits about the show's history in Schuyler. Located in historic country store. Guided tours available.

listings.name: Tye River
listings.description: Scenic mountain river offering excellent fishing opportunities. Popular with anglers for trout and smallmouth bass. Multiple access points along the river. Well-maintained fishing areas.

listings.name: James River
listings.description: Major river offering fishing, canoeing, and recreational opportunities. Scenic river valley with mountain backdrop. Multiple access points from Nelson County.

listings.name: Rockfish River
listings.description: Scenic river valley offering fishing and recreational opportunities. Easy river access at multiple points. Popular for fly fishing and wading. Mountains provide beautiful backdrop.

listings.name: Lake Nelson
listings.description: Mountain lake offering fishing, boating, and recreational opportunities. Scenic lake surrounded by forest. Seasonal amenities and access.

listings.name: Crabtree Golf Course
listings.description: Mountain golf course with challenging terrain and scenic views. 9-hole course perfect for golfers seeking natural mountain golf experience.

listings.name: Montebello Fish Hatchery
listings.description: Public fish hatchery offering educational tours and programs. Learn about fish propagation and conservation. Family-friendly educational destination.

listings.name: Oakland Museum
listings.description: Local history museum featuring exhibits on area heritage, culture, and natural history. Educational programs and rotating exhibits.

listings.name: Oak Ridge Estate
listings.description: Historic estate featuring preserved architecture and grounds. Guided tours available showing local history and architecture. Picnic areas available.

listings.name: Woodson's Mill
listings.description: Historic grist mill on the Rockfish River. Restored mill with operational waterwheel. Tours available showing traditional milling techniques. Beautiful riverside setting.

listings.name: Brew Ridge Trail
listings.description: Trail connecting multiple breweries and cideries in the Rockfish Valley. Walk or bike between craft beverage stops. Maps and information available at each stop.

listings.name: Nelson 151
listings.description: Route 151 connecting multiple breweries, wineries, and cideries. Scenic driving route through mountain valleys. Craft beverage trail map available.

listings.name: Nelson 29
listings.description: Scenic Route 29 passing through Nelson County with access to multiple attractions, farms, and businesses. Main north-south corridor through the county.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Fruit Loop
listings.description: Driving route connecting farms, orchards, and markets. Seasonal fruit picking and farm store shopping. Beautiful mountain scenery and agricultural landscapes.

listings.name: Virginia Spirits Trail
listings.description: Trail connecting distilleries and spirits producers in the region. Tasting rooms and tours available. Craft spirits with local character.

listings.name: Rockfish Valley Natural History Center
listings.description: Educational center focusing on local natural history, geology, and ecology. Interactive exhibits, programs, and guided walks. Family-friendly learning destination.

listings.name: Indian Summer Guide Service
listings.description: Guided outdoor activities including hiking, fishing, and naturalist tours. Experienced guides offering personalized experiences in Nelson County's natural areas.

listings.name: Nelson Scoops
listings.description: Local ice cream shop featuring homemade flavors and seasonal specialties. Outdoor seating with mountain views. Sweet treats and local favorite.

listings.name: Pharsalia Historic Farm
listings.description: Working farm and educational center offering farm tours, workshops, and seasonal events. Visit the farm store for locally-raised grass-fed beef, pastured pork, and farm-fresh eggs.

listings.name: Swannanoa Palace
listings.description: Historic Italian Renaissance-style marble mansion built in 1912 atop Afton Mountain. Offers guided tours showcasing Tiffany stained glass windows, marble columns, and panoramic mountain views.
listings.phone: Tours Available; Photography; Scenic Views; Wheelchair Accessible

listings.name: Dickie Brothers Orchard
listings.description: Pick-your-own apple orchard offering a variety of apple varieties. Seasonal activities including hayrides, corn maze, and farm store. Fresh apple products and seasonal treats.

listings.name: Drumheller's Orchard
listings.description: Family-owned orchard offering pick-your-own apples in season. Farm store featuring fresh produce, apple products, and local goods. Seasonal activities and scenic mountain views.

listings.name: Saunders Brothers Farm Market
listings.description: Farm market featuring fresh produce, local goods, and seasonal products from the family farm. Direct-from-farm freshness. Seasonal vegetables, fruits, and homemade items.

listings.name: Black Bear Creamery
listings.description: Artisan ice cream shop featuring homemade flavors and local ingredients. Seasonal specialties and traditional favorites. Outdoor seating with mountain views. Sweet treats and coffee.

listings.name: Big Arms Farm
listings.description: Farm offering agricultural products and educational experiences. Seasonal offerings and farm store. Supporting local agriculture.

listings.name: Caldwell Farms
listings.description: Family farm producing fresh agricultural products. Farm store featuring seasonal produce and local goods. Supporting sustainable agriculture.

listings.name: Davis Creek Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh produce and agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal offerings. Community-supported agriculture.

listings.name: Deer Creek Farm
listings.description: Farm featuring fresh produce and agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal goods and educational opportunities.

listings.name: Edible Landscaping
listings.description: Unique farm specializing in edible plants, fruit trees, and landscaping with food-bearing plants. Educational programs and nursery available.

listings.name: Fitzgerald Farms
listings.description: Family farm with farm store featuring fresh produce and agricultural products. Seasonal offerings and local goods. Supporting community agriculture.

listings.name: Fitzgerald's Orchard
listings.description: Apple orchard with farm store featuring fresh apples and apple products. Seasonal picking and farm store shopping.

listings.name: HeartRock Retreat & Homestead
listings.description: Mountain retreat and homestead offering lodging and educational programs. Sustainable living demonstrations and comfortable accommodations.

listings.name: Hungry Hill Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal produce and local goods. Supporting sustainable farming practices.

listings.name: Inglewood Fine Meats
listings.description: Farm producing high-quality grass-fed beef and pastured pork. Farm store with fresh meat products. Supporting sustainable livestock farming.

listings.name: Lost Point Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh produce and agricultural products. Farm store featuring seasonal offerings and local goods.

listings.name: One Forest
listings.description: Sustainable forestry and woodland management demonstration site. Educational programs about forest ecology and management.

listings.name: Robinia Institute
listings.description: Educational institute focusing on sustainable agriculture and environmental education. Programs and workshops available.

listings.name: Rose Isle Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh produce and agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal offerings and local goods.

listings.name: Seamans' Orchard
listings.description: Apple orchard featuring pick-your-own and farm store. Fresh apples and apple products. Seasonal activities and educational programs.

listings.name: Silver Creek and Seamans' Orchards
listings.description: Combined orchard operation featuring multiple apple varieties. Pick-your-own and farm store with fresh products and seasonal activities.

listings.name: Silver Creek Orchards
listings.description: Apple orchard with farm store featuring fresh apples and products. Pick-your-own opportunity and seasonal offerings.

listings.name: Silver Fox Lavender Farm
listings.description: Lavender farm featuring beautiful fields and farm products. Farm store with lavender products. Seasonal tours and educational programs.

listings.name: The Apple Shed
listings.description: Apple orchard with farm store featuring fresh apples and apple products. Seasonal picking and farm store shopping. Welcoming family atmosphere.

listings.name: Tinkerland Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal produce and local goods. Supporting sustainable farming.

listings.name: Turnip the Beets Farm
listings.description: Farm producing fresh vegetables and agricultural products. Farm store with seasonal offerings and CSA program.

listings.name: Virginia Chestnuts
listings.description: Farm specializing in chestnut production and farm products. Farm store with fresh chestnuts and chestnut products. Seasonal offerings.

listings.name: Appalachian Horse Adventures
listings.description: Guided horseback riding adventures in the mountains. Various trail rides for all skill levels. Mountain scenery and experienced guides.

listings.name: Rebel's Run at Afton Mountain
listings.description: Horseback riding facility offering trail rides and lessons. Scenic mountain trails with experienced guides. Suitable for all experience levels.

listings.name: Quest Gardens at Schuyler
listings.description: Botanical garden featuring native plants, ornamental gardens, and educational programs. Beautiful landscapes and seasonal displays. Guided tours available.

listings.name: Lake Monocan Park
listings.description: Mountain lake offering fishing, boating, and recreational opportunities. Scenic lake surrounded by forest. Park facilities and picnic areas.

listings.name: Wintergreen Ski & Snowboard
listings.description: Mountain resort ski area with ski and snowboard slopes. Lessons available for all skill levels. Snowmaking and grooming. Seasonal operation.

listings.name: Devils Knob Golf Course
listings.description: Mountain golf course with challenging terrain and scenic views. 18-hole course perfect for golfers seeking natural mountain golf experience.

listings.name: Lake Nelson Fishing
listings.description: Fishing destination on mountain lake. Popular for various fish species. Scenic setting and seasonal access.

listings.name: Montebello Fishing
listings.description: Mountain fishing destination with river access. Popular for trout fishing. Scenic mountain setting.

listings.name: Nelson County Golf Courses
listings.description: Multiple golf courses throughout Nelson County offering challenging play in scenic mountain settings. Varying difficulty levels and amenities.

listings.name: Fishing the Tye River
listings.description: Scenic mountain river offering excellent fishing opportunities. Popular with anglers for trout and smallmouth bass. Multiple access points.

listings.name: Fishing the James River
listings.description: Major river offering fishing for multiple species. Popular with anglers. Scenic river valley with mountain backdrop.

listings.name: Fishing the Little Piney River
listings.description: Mountain stream offering fishing opportunities. Popular for trout fishing. Scenic mountain setting.

listings.name: Fishing the South Rockfish River
listings.description: River fishing destination offering various fish species. Scenic river valley. Popular with local anglers.

listings.name: Fishing at Montebello
listings.description: Mountain fishing destination offering access to multiple fishing opportunities. Scenic setting and seasonal access.

listings.name: Fishing at Lake Monocan Park
listings.description: Lake fishing with scenic mountain backdrop. Popular for various fish species. Seasonal access with park facilities.

listings.name: Fishing at Lake Nelson
listings.description: Mountain lake fishing destination. Popular for various fish species. Scenic mountain lake setting.

listings.name: Wild Wolf Brewing
listings.description: Craft brewery with full kitchen, outdoor patio, and kid-friendly atmosphere. Known for creative seasonal beers and live music on weekends. Community gathering spot.

listings.name: Blue Mountain Brewery
listings.description: Farm brewery and taproom with an on-site hop yard. Full restaurant menu featuring locally-sourced ingredients and spectacular mountain views from multiple decks. Award-winning craft beers.

listings.name: Devils Backbone
listings.description: Award-winning craft brewery offering a variety of flagship and seasonal beers. Mountain views from the outdoor beer garden. Full restaurant menu. Live music weekends.

listings.name: Bold Rock Hard Cider
listings.description: Virginia's first cidery and taproom featuring handcrafted hard ciders made from fresh-pressed Virginia apples. Enjoy live music on the outdoor stage with mountain views, lawn games, and seasonal cider releases.

listings.name: Three Notch'd Brewery
listings.description: Craft brewery with rotating selection of beers and full kitchen. Comfortable taproom atmosphere with outdoor patio. Known for flagship IPAs and seasonal brews. Family-friendly.

listings.name: Brewing Tree Beer Company
listings.description: Craft brewery featuring innovative beer styles and creative seasonal offerings. Taproom with mountain views. Community-focused brewery known for quality and variety.

listings.name: Wild Man Dan Brewery
listings.description: Unique brewery featuring bold flavors and adventurous beer styles. Tasting room with local character. Known for creative recipes and quality ingredients.

listings.name: Wood Ridge Farm Brewery
listings.description: Farm brewery using ingredients grown on-site. Farm-to-glass philosophy with fresh seasonal hops and local ingredients. Tasting room and farm tours available.

listings.name: Blue Toad Hard Cider
listings.description: Small-batch hard cider made from Virginia apples. Tasting room with scenic mountain views. Artisanal ciders with unique flavor profiles. Outdoor seating and friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: St. George Brewing Company
listings.description: Nanobrewery and taproom in historic downtown Lovingston. Rotating selection of Belgian-style ales, IPAs, and seasonal brews. Intimate atmosphere with local art on the walls.

listings.name: Bryant's Cider & Brewery
listings.description: Craft brewery and hard cider producer featuring small-batch brews and Virginia apple ciders. Tasting room with mountain views. Known for creative seasonal offerings and friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Lovingston Winery
listings.description: Boutique winery producing premium Virginia wines with estate-grown grapes. Intimate tasting experiences and beautiful vineyard views. Wine and cheese pairings available. Event space for private gatherings.

listings.name: Hill Top Winery & Meadery
listings.description: Winery and meadery specializing in honey wines and traditional grape wines. Unique offerings combining Virginia grapes and local honey. Tasting room with mountain views and educational experiences.

listings.name: Flying Fox Vineyards
listings.description: Small family-owned vineyard producing elegant Virginia wines. Intimate tastings and vineyard tours. Beautiful setting with mountain views. Known for Viognier and Cabernet Franc.

listings.name: Mountain Cove Vineyards
listings.description: Scenic vineyard offering wine tastings in a relaxed atmosphere. Estate wines and beautiful mountain setting. Picnic areas available. Perfect for wine lovers seeking authentic Virginia wine experiences.

listings.name: Brent Manor Vineyards
listings.description: Family-owned winery producing premium Virginia wines. Estate-grown grapes and traditional winemaking techniques. Tasting room and outdoor pavilion with scenic views.

listings.name: Valley Road Vineyards
listings.description: Boutique winery offering handcrafted Virginia wines. Small production focusing on quality over quantity. Intimate tasting experiences and beautiful vineyard setting.

listings.name: Mountain and Vine Winery
listings.description: Mountain vineyard offering estate wines with stunning views. Wine tastings and tours available. Beautiful setting perfect for events and private gatherings.

listings.name: Caihailian Vineyard
listings.description: Small vineyard producing handcrafted wines from estate grapes. Intimate tastings and beautiful mountain setting.

listings.name: 12 Ridges Vineyard
listings.description: Family-owned vineyard featuring estate-grown grapes and award-winning wines. Beautiful mountain views and intimate tasting room. Winery tours and private events available.

listings.name: Afton Mountain Vineyards
listings.description: Stunning mountaintop winery with sweeping valley views. Award-winning Chardonnay and Cabernet Franc. Spacious tasting room with floor-to-ceiling windows. Covered outdoor terrace perfect for picnics.

listings.name: Cardinal Point Winery
listings.description: Family-owned boutique winery specializing in small-batch Virginia wines. Intimate tasting room with panoramic views of the Rockfish Valley. Known for their award-winning Viognier and Petit Verdot.

listings.name: Veritas Vineyards & Winery
listings.description: Award-winning winery with stunning views of the Blue Ridge foothills. Elegant tasting room and covered pavilion. Wine and cheese pairings. Live music Sunday afternoons.

listings.name: Devils Backbone Distilling
listings.description: Craft distillery producing vodka, gin, whiskey, and moonshine using Virginia grains. Tours and tastings available Friday-Sunday. Beautiful mountain views from the tasting room patio.

listings.name: Silverback Distillery
listings.description: Small-batch craft distillery producing premium spirits from local ingredients. Seasonal releases and specialty cocktails. Beautiful tasting room with mountain views. Tours by appointment.

listings.name: Virginia Distillery Co.
listings.description: Premium whiskey distillery crafting Scottish-style single malt and American whiskey. Sophisticated tasting room and tours. Award-winning spirits with heritage techniques. Beautiful rural setting.

listings.name: Fire & Frost Wood Fired Bakehouse
listings.description: Artisan wood-fired bread bakery featuring European-style breads, pastries, and baked goods. Authentic sourdough, rustic loaves, and seasonal specialties. Cafe with coffee and light fare.

listings.name: Ann's Family Restaurant
listings.description: Good old country cooking. Fresh vegetables and specials every day. Closed Saturday. Family-owned restaurant serving traditional Southern meals with daily specials and home-style cooking.

listings.name: Chen's Restaurant
listings.description: Family-owned Chinese restaurant serving authentic dishes, sushi, and Asian cuisine. Traditional recipes and friendly service in a comfortable setting.

listings.name: Chirio's Pizza
listings.description: Authentic Italian pizzeria serving traditional and creative pizza combinations. Fresh ingredients, homemade dough, and traditional Italian flavors. Cozy neighborhood spot.

listings.name: Coquito Kitchen
listings.description: Puerto Rican fusion restaurant serving authentic Caribbean flavors. Traditional recipes, plantains, arroz con gandules, and specialty cocktails. Vibrant dining experience.

listings.name: El Mariachi Mexican Food
listings.description: Authentic Mexican restaurant serving traditional tacos, enchiladas, burritos, and daily specials. Fresh ingredients and traditional recipes in a vibrant atmosphere.

listings.name: Indian Oven
listings.description: Authentic Indian cuisine featuring tandoori specialties, curries, vegetarian options and traditional favorites. Family-owned restaurant bringing the flavors of India to the mountains with fresh spices and traditional cooking techniques.

listings.name: Basic Necessities
listings.description: Locally owned market featuring natural foods, organic produce, bulk items, vitamins, and specialty health products. Supporting local farmers and sustainable living.

listings.name: Crestvue Cottage
listings.description: Mountain cottage with scenic views and comfortable accommodations. Ideal base for exploring the mountains and nearby attractions. Fully equipped for self-catering.

listings.name: Sentosa Cabin
listings.description: Charming mountain cabin with rustic character and modern comforts. Peaceful setting perfect for relaxation. Hiking trails nearby.

listings.name: Roudy's Retreat
listings.description: Mountain retreat offering comfortable accommodations with scenic views. Cozy atmosphere and modern amenities. Close to wineries and breweries.

listings.name: Pachi's Ridge
listings.description: Mountain ridge retreat with stunning views and comfortable accommodations. Peaceful setting perfect for rest and relaxation.

listings.name: Boogie Nights Manor
listings.description: Unique themed mountain lodging with character and charm. Comfortable accommodations in scenic setting.

listings.name: The Big Tiny House
listings.description: Unique tiny house experience in the mountains. Compact but comfortable accommodations perfect for an adventure.

listings.name: Rusty's Retreat
listings.description: Mountain retreat with comfortable accommodations and scenic views. Rustic charm with modern amenities.

listings.name: Village Inn
listings.description: Comfortable inn accommodations in mountain setting. Close to resort amenities and outdoor activities.

listings.name: Cozy Mountain Cottage
listings.description: Charming mountain cottage with comfortable accommodations and scenic views. Perfect for small families or couples seeking mountain retreat.

listings.name: Piedmont Grove Lodging
listings.description: Mountain lodging in scenic grove setting. Comfortable accommodations surrounded by nature.

listings.name: Beech Grove Farmhouse
listings.description: Historic farmhouse offering comfortable mountain lodging. Character and charm with modern amenities.

listings.name: Straw Bale House
listings.description: Eco-friendly straw bale construction house offering unique mountain lodging experience. Sustainable design and comfortable accommodations.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Bliss
listings.description: Mountain retreat with stunning Blue Ridge views. Comfortable accommodations and peaceful setting perfect for relaxation.

listings.name: Stays at Lovingston Winery
listings.description: Unique lodging on working winery. Experience vineyard life with comfortable accommodations. Wine tastings included.

listings.name: The Cottage at Pines End
listings.description: Mountain cottage in peaceful forest setting. Comfortable accommodations surrounded by pines. Hiking trails nearby.

listings.name: Woodson's Mill House
listings.description: Historic mill house offering comfortable accommodations. Beautiful riverside setting and proximity to mill tours.

listings.name: Harmony Hill Bed & Breakfast
listings.description: Charming bed & breakfast in scenic mountain setting. Comfortable accommodations and warm hospitality. Morning breakfast included.

listings.name: Spyrock Lodge
listings.description: Mountain lodge offering comfortable accommodations near Spy Rock. Scenic setting perfect for hikers and nature enthusiasts.

listings.name: Point of View
listings.description: Mountain lodging with spectacular views and comfortable accommodations. Ideal location for experiencing the mountains.

listings.name: The Inn at Blue Mountain Brewery
listings.description: Lodging at Blue Mountain Brewery. Experience the brewery with comfortable accommodations. Beer tastings and dining on-site.

listings.name: The Chimneys
listings.description: Historic mountain lodging with character and charm. Comfortable accommodations and scenic setting.

listings.name: The Carriage House at Stagebridge Farm
listings.description: Charming carriage house on working farm. Unique lodging experience with farm activities nearby. Comfortable accommodations.

listings.name: Indigo House Bed & Breakfast
listings.description: Charming B&B with mountain views. Comfortable accommodations and warm hospitality. Morning breakfast and afternoon tea included.

listings.name: Papa's Cottage
listings.description: Family-oriented cottage offering comfortable mountain lodging. Ideal for families seeking comfortable vacation accommodation.

listings.name: Meme's Cottage
listings.description: Charming cottage with comfortable accommodations. Family-friendly lodging in scenic mountain setting.

listings.name: Cheval Circle
listings.description: Mountain lodging with scenic views and comfortable accommodations. Peaceful setting perfect for rest and relaxation.

listings.name: The Wine Cottage
listings.description: Unique cottage near wineries. Comfortable accommodations with wine tasting opportunities nearby. Perfect for wine lovers.

listings.name: Carter's Cottage
listings.description: Mountain cottage offering comfortable accommodations and scenic views. Peaceful setting perfect for mountain getaway.

listings.name: Beech Grove Cottage
listings.description: Charming cottage in scenic mountain setting. Comfortable accommodations with rustic character. Hiking trails nearby.

listings.name: Montebello Resort
listings.description: Mountain resort offering cabins and camping in beautiful natural setting. Access to hiking trails, fishing, and outdoor recreation.

listings.name: Freshwater Field Cabin
listings.description: Mountain cabin in scenic field setting. Comfortable accommodations surrounded by natural beauty. Peaceful location.

listings.name: Rapunzel's Coffee & Books
listings.description: Rapunzel's Coffee and Books is an eclectic arts venue, community space, coffee shop, and used bookstore located in The Packing Shed in historic Lovingston, Virginia. Rapunzel's Further Ado Foundation hosts live music every Wednesday Friday and Saturday evenings starting at 8pm.

listings.name: Sweet Bliss Bakery
listings.description: Our desserts are lovingly handcrafted from the finest ingredients. We love supporting our local farmers and offer seasonal desserts so they are at their peak of freshness. We are passionate about creating fresh decadent desserts. Our specialty are cheesecakes and cakes with over 50 flavors.

listings.name: Terrace Café
listings.description: Stop in for a shot of energy! The Terrace Café proudly serve Starbucks beverages. Enjoy breakfast sandwiches sweet treats and warm specialty drinks to brighten your day. Hours vary by season.

listings.name: Trager Brothers Coffee
listings.description: Family-owned specialty coffee shop serving only Organic coffee. OCIA certified Organic coffee roastery committed to bringing the highest quality freshest coffee. We are proud to serve locally roasted beans and homemade baked goods.

listings.name: Afton Market
listings.description: Local market featuring fresh produce specialty foods Virginia wines and craft items. Supporting Nelson County farmers and artisans. Open daily with seasonal hours.

listings.name: Ashley's Market
listings.description: Family-owned market offering groceries, deli items, Virginia products and everyday essentials. Serving the local community with friendly service. Located along Route 151.

listings.name: Chicken Coop
listings.description: Homemade chicken, barbecue, fresh burgers, mac and cheese, and variety of sandwiches. Located in the Nelson Food Mart (Exxon Station). Popular local spot known for quality Southern comfort food and daily specials.

listings.name: Colleen Deli
listings.description: Daily fried chicken and lunch specials. Full breakfast served from open to close. Salad bar during the summer. Full menu featuring sandwiches, wraps, subs and more. Homemade baked goods for your sweet tooth. Located in the Colleen Exxon & Convenience Mart on Rt. 29.

listings.name: Corner Market
listings.description: Convenience store and gas. Deli open for breakfast and lunch. Stop in and check out our deli items. Friendly local market serving the Schuyler community.

listings.name: Graves Grocery & Deli
listings.description: Convenience store and gas. Deli open: breakfast and lunch daily. Serving the Nellysford community with groceries, hot deli items, and everyday essentials.

listings.name: Hickman's Exxon Grocery
listings.description: Game Checking Station (all game). Convenience store and gas station offering groceries, snacks, beverages, and local goods. Full deli counter with prepared foods.

listings.name: IGA Blue Ridge Grocery
listings.description: Independent grocery store offering fresh produce, meat, baked goods, and grocery essentials. Full-service deli counter with daily specials. Complete one-stop shopping destination.

listings.name: Ike's Market & Deli
listings.description: Local market featuring groceries, deli items, hot foods, and Virginia specialties. Game Checking Station. Known for friendly service and quality products in historic Schuyler.

listings.name: Mac's Country Store
listings.description: Grocery Store and Gas. Featuring local honey, fishing supplies and bait. Convenient stop for everyday needs and outdoor supplies. Local products and friendly service.

listings.name: The Market at Wintergreen
listings.description: Convenience Store, Groceries, Deli and Gas. Wintergreen sweatshirts and tee shirts. Deli open: 7:30 am to 7:30 pm daily. Resort convenience store for guests and visitors.

listings.name: Williams Grocery
listings.description: Grocery Store and Gas. Featuring local honey, fishing supplies and bait. Convenient stop for everyday needs and outdoor supplies in historic Schuyler.

listings.name: Giuseppe's Restaurant
listings.description: Italian restaurant serving traditional pasta dishes, pizza, and Italian favorites. Family-owned establishment known for generous portions and authentic recipes. Wine list available.

listings.name: Blue Ridge Pig
listings.description: Authentic Southern barbecue featuring pulled pork, brisket, ribs, and all the fixin's. Popular local spot known for quality meats smoked to perfection. Family-friendly atmosphere.

listings.name: Bold Kitchen at Bold Rock
listings.description: Full kitchen at Bold Rock Hard Cider featuring wood-fired pizzas, burgers, seasonal dishes, and comfort food. Enjoy craft cider with delicious food on the scenic grounds.

listings.name: The Copper Mine Bistro
listings.description: Bistro offering farm-to-table cuisine featuring locally-sourced ingredients. Creative menu with seasonal specials. Wine and craft beer selection. Cozy upscale dining.

listings.name: The Edge
listings.description: Casual dining at Wintergreen Resort featuring American classics and daily specials. Family-friendly atmosphere with mountain views. Full bar with local craft beers and cocktails.

listings.name: The Farmhouse at Veritas
listings.description: Fine dining restaurant at Veritas Vineyards featuring contemporary American cuisine with local ingredients. Farm-to-table philosophy with wine pairings. Elegant atmosphere.

listings.name: Vito's Pizza & Italian Grill
listings.description: Authentic Italian pizzeria and grill serving traditional recipes. Hand-tossed pizzas, pasta dishes, and Italian entrees. Family recipes passed down through generations.

listings.name: Black Bear Creamery
listings.description: Artisan ice cream shop featuring homemade flavors and local ingredients. Seasonal specialties and traditional favorites. Outdoor seating with mountain views. Sweet treats and coffee.

listings.name: Iron and Ale
listings.description: Gastropub featuring craft beer and elevated pub fare. Signature burgers, sandwiches, and daily specials. Cozy atmosphere with outdoor patio. Craft beer selection from local breweries.

listings.name: Montebello Country Store & Cafe
listings.description: Historic country store offering groceries, supplies, hot food, and local goods. Cafe serving breakfast and lunch daily. Convenient stop for hikers and travelers. Historic building with character.

listings.name: Paulie's Pig Out
listings.description: Barbecue restaurant specializing in pulled pork, brisket, ribs, and Southern sides. Pit-smoked meats and traditional barbecue sauces. Casual family dining with hearty portions.

listings.name: Smokin' Barrel Restaurant
listings.description: Barbecue and smokehouse featuring slow-smoked meats, Southern sides, and craft beer. Pit-smoked specialties with flavorful rubs and sauces. Casual mountain atmosphere.

listings.name: Appalachian Trail from Rt 56 to Harpers Creek
listings.description: Scenic section of the Appalachian Trail featuring mountain ridge walks, forest views, and challenging terrain. Connects to other AT sections. Popular for day hikes and overnight backpacking.

listings.name: Blackrock Summit Trail
listings.description: Moderate 1-mile loop trail to unique rock formations. Part of the Appalachian Trail with stunning Blue Ridge views. Rocky terrain with some challenging scrambles near summit.

listings.name: Cedar Cliffs North Trail
listings.description: Moderate trail through hardwood forest to scenic cliffs overlooking valleys. Beautiful year-round with excellent fall foliage viewing. Well-marked and maintained path.

listings.name: Chestnut Springs Trail
listings.description: Easy-to-moderate trail following a mountain spring. Beautiful wildflowers in spring and colorful foliage in fall. Family-friendly with gentle elevation gain.

listings.name: Devils Knob Trail
listings.description: Mountain summit trail with challenging elevation gain. Spectacular 360-degree views from Devils Knob. Part of Wintergreen Resort trail network. Steep rocky sections.

listings.name: Fortune's Ridge Trail
listings.description: Moderate trail with rolling terrain through mountain forests. Multiple scenic overlooks. Connects to other trail networks. Popular for hiking and wildlife watching.

listings.name: Hemlock Springs Loop
listings.description: Easy 2.5-mile loop trail through hemlock groves and mountain springs. Gentle elevation changes perfect for beginners. Cool forest environment even in summer.

listings.name: Highlands Leisure Trail
listings.description: Easy paved trail perfect for families, joggers, and walkers. Connects various Wintergreen resort amenities. Accessible to all abilities with gentle terrain.

listings.name: Laurel Ridge Loop
listings.description: Moderate 4-mile loop through mountain laurel forests. Spectacular when flowering in early summer. Mix of forest and meadow environments with scenic overlooks.

listings.name: Lower Shamokin Falls Trail
listings.description: Trail to beautiful cascading waterfall in secluded mountain setting. Moderate difficulty with some rocky sections. Best after rainfall for maximum water flow.

listings.name: Mau-Har Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail connecting to Appalachian Trail network. Named for the stream it follows. Features waterfalls, forest, and mountain views. Part of longer backpacking loop.

listings.name: Montebello Nature Trail
listings.description: Easy 1-mile interpretive nature trail perfect for families. Educational signage about local flora and fauna. Great introduction to mountain ecology.

listings.name: Nelson County Wilderness Area
listings.description: Large protected wilderness area with extensive trail network. Backcountry camping allowed. Remote mountain terrain with diverse ecosystems. Solitude and adventure.

listings.name: North Fork of the Piney River
listings.description: Scenic mountain river offering fishing, tubing, and swimming opportunities. Popular summer destination for water recreation. Accessible from multiple points along the river.

listings.name: Old Appalachian Trail
listings.description: Historic section of Appalachian Trail before route relocation. Pleasant forest hiking with mountain views. Less crowded than current AT route.

listings.name: Paul's Creek Trail
listings.description: Trail following mountain creek through diverse forest. Multiple small waterfalls and pools. Popular for cooling off in summer. Moderate difficulty with gradual elevation gain.

listings.name: Pedlars Edge Trail
listings.description: Trail with rewarding mountain summit views. Moderate to challenging sections with rocky terrain. Excellent for experienced hikers seeking solitude.

listings.name: Pond Hollow Trail
listings.description: Easy 1.5-mile loop trail around mountain pond. Abundant wildlife and wetland ecology. Great for families with young children. Boardwalk section over wetland areas.

listings.name: Ravens Roost Park
listings.description: Scenic overlook park with stunning Blue Ridge views. Picnic area and interpretive displays. Popular for sunset viewing. Easy access from road.

listings.name: Shamokin Springs Nature Preserve
listings.description: Protected natural area with multiple springs and diverse ecology. Educational programs available. Beautiful forest trails and wildlife viewing opportunities.

listings.name: Trillium Field
listings.description: Mountain meadow ablaze with white trillium wildflowers in spring. Spectacular seasonal display. Easy access trail through scenic mountain meadow. Peak viewing in late April-early May.

listings.name: Upper Shamokin Falls Trail
listings.description: Trail to upper section of mountain waterfall. Challenging sections with rewarding views. Rocky terrain with multiple overlook points. Less traveled than lower falls trail.

listings.name: Upper Shamokin Gorge Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail through dramatic mountain gorge. Spectacular rock formations and powerful waterfalls. Strenuous terrain for experienced hikers only.

listings.name: White Oak Trail
listings.description: Easy 2-mile loop through mature white oak forest. Gentle terrain perfect for all ages. Beautiful in autumn with golden oak leaves. Interpretive signage available.

listings.name: White Rock Falls
listings.description: Beautiful waterfall accessible via moderate trail. Rocky cascade through forest setting. Popular swimming hole below falls. Moderate elevation gain with rewarding destination.

listings.name: Brimstone Trail
listings.description: Challenging trail featuring rocky terrain and mountain views. Strenuous sections with rewarding scenic overlooks. Part of larger trail network offering wilderness experience.
